system.description:
The Overlord does not make friends. When you cause great personal harm to someone or their people, @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.bond-moves.Item.28gRsLA4GNORvwg6]{Forge a Bond} with them. Your Bonds can only be erased by your own Moves, and you can hold any number of Bonds.

When you reveal a side of yourself to someone you never intended to share it with, they may @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.bond-moves.Item.28gRsLA4GNORvwg6]{Forge a Bond} with you. You cannot erase the Bonds they hold with you, no matter how badly you might want to.
